revised_title: A New Map of the River Volga and Its Colonies
tldr: John Reinhold Forster shares his experience and methods in creating a new and improved map of the River Volga. He traveled through the region, measured angles and distances, and compared his work with other maps to highlight its accuracy and improvements. The map includes details of colonies and settlements along the river, as well as a separate map of a canal connecting the Volga and Don rivers.
